entities.description: The preferred method of reporting weight, either in pounds or kilograms.
The weight of the respondent in pounds or kilograms.
The weight of the respondent before and during pregnancy.
Number of times a respondent was treated in an emergency room in the past 12 months for any reason.
Whether the respondent has stayed overnight or longer in a hospital as an inpatient in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to their preferred method of weight reporting.
Indicates the weight of the respondent in pounds or kilograms.
Indicates the weight of the respondent before and during pregnancy.
Indicates the number of times the respondent was treated in an emergency room in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent has stayed overnight or longer in a hospital as an inpatient in the past 12 months.
